name: Eternal Isolation
oracle_text: Put target creature with power 4 or greater on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: "Well, at least it's a lovely view."

name: Fry
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Fry deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker that's white or blue.
flavor_text:
"I'm afraid your dinner got a little . . . overcooked."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper

name: Brineborn Cutthroat
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brineborn Cutthroat.
flavor_text: "I always attack from where their spyglasses can't see."

name: Ogre Siegebreaker
oracle_text: {2}{B}{R}: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text:
"What he doesn't burn, he smashes."
—Captain Wellis, ogre wrangler

name: Barkhide Troll
oracle_text:
Barkhide Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Barkhide Troll: Barkhide Troll gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Master Splicer
oracle_text:
When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: Phyrexian artificers remove the flesh they no longer need and use it to bring their unholy creations to a greater semblance of life.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: In Amonkhet's ever-shifting sands, nothing stays buried for long.

name: Gruesome Scourger
oracle_text: When Gruesome Scourger enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text: His whips twist and tremble like living things, moved by the fury of the horde he commands.

name: Ember Hauler
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Not every job in the goblin army is glamorous. Actually, *no* job in the goblin army is glamorous.

name: Yarok's Fenlurker
oracle_text:
When Yarok's Fenlurker enters the battlefield, each opponent exiles a card from their hand.
{2}{B}: Yarok's Fenlurker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Yarok's nightmares lurk and wait
Where dark despair is near at hand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 3

name: Disfigure
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Let this serve as a reminder of your failure."
—Exdratha, bog witch

name: Waterkin Shaman
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, Waterkin Shaman gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "They come to drink, to bathe, and—I believe—to play."

name: Woodland Champion
oracle_text: Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Woodland Champion.
flavor_text: "Every footfall on the forest floor is a heartbeat sending strength into my veins."

name: Bloodthirsty Aerialist
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.
flavor_text: A circus acrobat in life, she kills with such fluid grace that even her victims are awed by her performance.

name: Ancestral Blade
oracle_text:
When Ancestral Blade enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Rapacious Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"Surely it won't notice if I take—"
—Theria the Sly, last words

name: Pyroclastic Elemental
oracle_text: {1}{R}{R}: Pyroclastic Elemental deals 1 damage to target player.
flavor_text:
"Whoever thought of making mobile volcanoes was a genius."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Devout Decree
oracle_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker that's black or red. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text:
"It is not punishment. I am simply making things as they should be."
—Sephara, Sky's Blade

name: Portal of Sanctuary
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature you control and each Aura attached to it to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn.
flavor_text:
"If you need to disappear for a while, I know a place."
—Bilivus, master archivist

name: Scuttlemutt
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: With five lenses on its "head," it sees the world in a range of colors beyond ordinary perception.

name: Lightning Stormkin
oracle_text:
Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: "I strike in the same place as many times as necessary."

name: Flame Sweep
oracle_text: Flame Sweep deals 2 damage to each creature except for creatures you control with flying.
flavor_text:
"I have calculated that a dragon in flight, in a single strafing run, can cover an area of—"
—Thaedus the Clever, last words

name: Dragon Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
flavor_text:
"Yes, it's huge and strong and breathes fire. But we're smart!"
—Tadith the Wise, last words

name: Fencing Ace
oracle_text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: "Go find yourself a couple of friends, and bring me a blindfold. Then we might have a fair fight."

name: Skyknight Vanguard
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Skyknight Vanguard attacks, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking.
flavor_text: "Jump! NOW!"

name: Retributive Wand
oracle_text:
{3}, {T}: Retributive Wand deals 1 damage to any target.
When Retributive Wand is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The last blast is the biggest."
—Sargis Haz, artificer

name: Thirsting Bloodlord
oracle_text: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "A whole life, full of memories and experience, love and sorrow, drained drop by drop into this bottle. Could any feast be more glorious?"

name: Tomebound Lich
oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Whenever Tomebound Lich enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Moldervine Reclamation
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The heroes of the past nourish our spirits by their example—and nourish our crops by their decay."
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves

name: Apostle of Purifying Light
oracle_text:
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything black.)
{2}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text: Waves of gloom crash in vain against his unyielding light.

name: Twinblade Paladin
oracle_text:
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Twinblade Paladin.
As long as you have 25 or more life, Twinblade Paladin has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

name: Season of Growth
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Awake, and lift your faces to the sun."

name: Spectral Sailor
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
{3}{U}: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Any ship that sails on these mean seas for long is bound to pick up a ghost or two."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Gnarlback Rhino
oracle_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Gnarlback Rhino, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I think it's trying to tell us that the forest is angry."
—Vivien Reid

name: Goblin Ringleader
oracle_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Manifold Key
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}: Untap another target artifact.
{3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Locks want to be opened, and treasure wants to be free."
—Nayrex Slipfinger, master thief

name: Overcome
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)
flavor_text:
"Forward! Until the horizon is ours!"
—Khemses, charioteer

name: Aether Gust
oracle_text: Choose target spell or permanent that's red or green. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor_text: The chill wind extinguishes flame, and frosts the leaf on the branch.

name: Blood for Bones
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Overgrowth Elemental
oracle_text:
When Overgrowth Elemental enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Elemental you control.
Whenever another creature you control dies, you gain 1 life. If that creature was an Elemental, put a +1/+1 counter on Overgrowth Elemental.

name: Loyal Pegasus
oracle_text:
Flying
Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text:
"Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground."
—Hypatia of the Winged Horse

name: Scholar of the Ages
oracle_text: When Scholar of the Ages enters the battlefield, return up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I study the past to find hope for the future."

name: Risen Reef
oracle_text: Whenever Risen Reef or another Elemental enters the battlefield under your control, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, put it into your hand.
flavor_text:
"No, not 'washed' ashore. It *walked* ashore."
—Shafring Hulm, beachcomber

name: Uncaged Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: The cage is a crucible for the rage that builds inside, refining it into something pure and terrible.

name: Chandra's Spitfire
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I've lit most everything on fire—trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."

name: Corpse Knight
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"With each knight that rode out from the bone-white keep, the queen's soldiers felt their courage failing."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Salvager of Ruin
oracle_text: Sacrifice Salvager of Ruin: Choose target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand.
flavor_text:
"The next model should be able to achieve a rescue without self-destruction."
—Sargis Haz, artificer

name: Noxious Grasp
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker that's green or white. You gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"The bog doesn't give a stinking bubble about your title, wealth, or piety. It's just hungry."
—Byaras, backwoods guide

name: Gods Willing
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Pulse of Murasa
oracle_text: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.
flavor_text: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."

name: Herald of the Sun
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature with flying.
flavor_text: "Fear neither clouds nor darkness. The light shall overcome them all."

name: Rule of Law
oracle_text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
flavor_text: The law is meant to ensure that people kill each other with only the utmost fairness.

name: Air Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.

name: Captivating Gyre
oracle_text: Return up to three target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"That's enough of that."
—Atemsis, All-Seeing

name: Veil of Summer
oracle_text: Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can't be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of blue or black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Empyrean Eagle
oracle_text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
flavor_text: All the birds of the skies are the spirit's brood, gathered for safety under its wings.

name: Pattern Matcher
oracle_text: When Pattern Matcher enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card with the same name as another creature you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"Good! Now put it with the other widdle bunnies."
—Sargis Haz, artificer

name: Cerulean Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Protection from red (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything red.)
Sacrifice Cerulean Drake: Counter target spell that targets you.
flavor_text: Dragons avoid the bright colors of its wings.

name: Vampire of the Dire Moon
oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "This place suits me: craven authorities and plentiful prey."

name: Thrashing Brontodon
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.

name: Meteor Golem
oracle_text: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
flavor_text: The impact sent the soldiers scattering—then something came out of the crater.

name: Bloodsoaked Altar
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Discard a card, Sacrifice a creature: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: Blood seeps into the stone, and darkness emerges.

name: Warden of Evos Isle
oracle_text:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.

name: Wolfrider's Saddle
oracle_text:
When Wolfrider's Saddle enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, then attach Wolfrider's Saddle to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Blightbeetle
oracle_text:
Protection from green (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything green.)
Creatures your opponents control can't have +1/+1 counters put on them.
flavor_text: Leaf and soul alike wither at its touch.

name: Mask of Immolation
oracle_text:
When Mask of Immolation enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token, then attach Mask of Immolation to it.
Equipped creature has "Sacrifice this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target."
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Yarok's Wavecrasher
oracle_text: When Yarok's Wavecrasher enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Yarok's waters rush and rage
Where armies bled into the sand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 2

name: Corpse Knight
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"With each knight that rode out from the bone-white keep, the queen's soldiers felt their courage failing."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Vengeful Warchief
oracle_text: Whenever you lose life for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vengeful Warchief. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor_text: "Try to steal from me and I'll add your skull to my collection."

name: Chandra, Novice Pyromancer
oracle_text:
+1: Elementals you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
−1: Add {R}{R}.
−2: Chandra, Novice Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Gauntlets of Light
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
Enchanted creature has "{2}{W}: Untap this creature."

name: Diviner's Lockbox
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Choose a card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, sacrifice Diviner's Lockbox and draw three cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text:
"I see it taunting me whenever I close my eyes."
—Nayrex Slipfinger, master thief

name: Unchained Berserker
oracle_text:
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything white.)
Unchained Berserker gets +2/+0 as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: Sathros turned his restraints to revenge.

name: Scampering Scorcher
oracle_text: When Scampering Scorcher enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens. Elementals you control gain haste until end of turn. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Keep your flammables out of reach."
—Kerin, watch sergeant

name: Hard Cover
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has "{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card."
flavor_text: A good book is a refuge, but a great book is a fortress.

name: Loaming Shaman
oracle_text: When Loaming Shaman enters the battlefield, target player shuffles any number of target cards from their graveyard into their library.
flavor_text:
"The living don't ever stay living, and the dead don't always stay dead."
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves

name: Angel of Vitality
oracle_text:
Flying
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Angel of Vitality gets +2/+2 as long as you have 25 or more life.

name: Howling Giant
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
When Howling Giant enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
flavor_text: He and his pack sing the same mournful song to the moon.

name: Renowned Weaponsmith
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
{U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Ironroot Warlord
oracle_text:
Ironroot Warlord's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
{3}{G}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
flavor_text:
"Alone, it's a fortification. At the head of its troops, it's a battering ram."
—Skerk Hobnett, wilderness guide

name: Diamond Knight
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
As Diamond Knight enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, put a +1/+1 counter on Diamond Knight.

name: Creeping Trailblazer
oracle_text:
Other Elementals you control get +1/+0.
{2}{R}{G}: Creeping Trailblazer gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.
flavor_text: The destruction of a wildfire with the tenacity of a jungle vine.

name: Volcanic Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text:
"That's no ordinary eruption!"
—Grazlash Stonehold, last words

name: Thought Distortion
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Target opponent reveals their hand. Exile all noncreature, nonland cards from that player's hand and graveyard.
flavor_text:
"The skull is rigid, but the mind is so deliciously supple."
—Eromena the Mind Render

name: Might of the Masses
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
flavor_text: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

name: Colossus Hammer
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +10/+10 and loses flying.
Equip {8} ({8}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "There's only one way to be sure it's really dead."

name: Cryptic Caves
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.
flavor_text: Only when you've given up the search will the caves yield their secrets.
